pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to 'Python' Package 'stepmix' // This is an interface for the 'python' package 'stepmix'. This is a package multi- step estimation of latent class models with measurement and structural components. The package can also be used to fit mixture models with various observed random variables. Largely based on Bakk Kuha (2018) doi:10.1007/s11336-017-9592-7.
